mapper.select: select kaipiao_danwei as name,sum(convert(float,isnull(jiashui_heji,0))) as jiashui_heji from xiaoshou_kaipiao where kaipiao_riqi >= #{start_date} and kaipiao_riqi <= #{stop_date} group by kaipiao_danwei

select shoupiao_danwei as name,sum(convert(float,isnull(jiashui_heji,0))) as jiashui_heji from xiaoshou_kaipiao where kaipiao_riqi >= #{start_date} and kaipiao_riqi <= #{stop_date} group by shoupiao_danwei
